item.title: Players
item.description: Go is a game for two players. Whenever you start a new game the game requires you to choose two players from the list of existing players. Players are managed in the Settings area of the app under “Players”. The “Players” settings screen Human players Computer players The “Players” settings screen There are two types of players: Human players and computer players. The app comes with a set of pre-defined players, which you can see in the following illustration.

item.title: The computer player
item.description: A computer player has many settings, each of which defines a certain technical aspect of how that particular computer player calculates its moves. The settings can be placed into 2 main categories: Settings that affect the computer player’s playing strength. Settings that define the computer player’s resign behaviour. Read on to learn more.
